mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SD_Volunteer(volunteerId, mem_check, name, gender, age, tel_1, tel_2, tel_3, email, area, peopleCnt, vKind , experience, necessity, vOption, fdate1, time, selfIntroduce) VALUES (vol_seq.NEXTVAL, #{mem_check}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{tel_1}, #{tel_2}, #{tel_3}, #{email}, #{area}, #{peopleCnt}, #{vKind} , #{experience}, #{necessity}, #{vOption}, #{fdate1}, #{time}, #{selfIntroduce})
